snippet: The conference, Unicef’s first to focus on the connection, explores ways of encouraging better sanitation so children can avoid the consequences of stunting.
abstract: Unicef begins conference in New Delhi to explore ways of encouraging better hygiene so children can avoid devastating consequences of stunting; conference is response to research that links childhood malnutrition with poor sanitation.
lead_paragraph: The conference, Unicef’s first to focus on the connection, explores ways of encouraging better sanitation so children can avoid the consequences of stunting.
